data.description:
Drum Simulator & Note Highway Rhythm Games
Free style like a real drum kit or have fun trying for a high score on the note highway.

- Hardware drum kit
- Electronic drum kit pads + customizable
- Fun rhythm games to practice your timing
- Customizable VR drum simulator.

You can add your own custom music to the note highways.

In-game Quest file browser .MP3/.OGG/.WAV audio player. Play your own music files directly within your Quest headset. (Storage/SD)

Position your drum hardware or eKit pad layout. Modify each drums sound by using different drum heads, cymbals, hi-hats etc.

Tenor Drum Mode Included:
Tenor drum harness and tenor drums included. Used in marching bands and live/sporting events.

- Position your hardware
- Pressure sensitive physics
- Bass and hi-hat foot pedals (VR Controller)
- Bass and hi-hat foot pedals (Connect USB Pedal/Gamepad)
- Multiple locations
- Save the hardware kit layout and return to it
- Change drums sounds and look
- Add your own must to the note highway to work on your timing

Sounds Hardware Included:
8 snare drums, 5 bass drums, also an amped bass drum, 5 crash cymbals, 2 ride cymbals, 3 splash cymbals, tom drums 6", 8", 10", 12", 14". A roto tom rack 6", 8", 10" roto toms, 4 different hi-hats (rock, 50's, metal trash etc), china cymbals, dry ride/crash, custom china stack, mounted tambourine, cow bells, steelpan drum and more.

Test Included:
- Liv.tv

Note: 
Custom music/drum charts (.chart) files must be added by you.
